mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') days, COUNT(id) count FROM asgard_saga_instance WHERE STATUS = 'FAILED' AND start_time BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} GROUP BY days

SELECT asi.ID AS ID, asi.SAGA_CODE AS SAGA_CODE, ( SELECT aos.description FROM asgard_orch_saga aos WHERE aos. CODE = asi.SAGA_CODE ) AS description, ( SELECT aos.service FROM asgard_orch_saga aos WHERE aos. CODE = asi.SAGA_CODE ) AS service, asi.FD_LEVEL AS LEVEL, asi.REF_TYPE AS REF_TYPE, asi.REF_ID AS REF_ID, asi.START_TIME AS START_TIME, asi.END_TIME AS END_TIME, sum(CASE WHEN asti.STATUS = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS COMPLETED_COUNT, sum(CASE WHEN asti.STATUS = 'RUNNING' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS RUNNING_COUNT, sum(CASE WHEN asti.STATUS = 'ROLLBACK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ROLLBACK_COUNT, sum(CASE WHEN asti.STATUS = 'FAILED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FAILED_COUNT, sum(CASE WHEN asti.STATUS = 'WAIT_TO_BE_PULLED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WAIT_TO_BE_PULLED_COUNT FROM asgard_saga_instance asi LEFT OUTER JOIN asgard_saga_task_instance asti ON asi.ID = asti.SAGA_INSTANCE_ID WHERE asi.ID = #{id} GROUP BY asi.id
SELECT asgard_saga_instance.* FROM asgard_saga_instance WHERE status = 'UN_CONFIRMED' AND unix_timestamp(CREATION_DATE) + #{timeOut} < unix_timestamp(#{now})
SELECT id FROM asgard_saga_instance WHERE status = 'COMPLETED' AND unix_timestamp(LAST_UPDATE_DATE) + #{fromNowSeconds} < unix_timestamp(#{now})
